define.name: USE_SERVO_PAN_TILT
define.description: Use servos to control pan & tilt mechanism

define.name: PAN_SERVO_ID
define.description: Id of the pan servo (default: PAN_SERVO)

define.name: TILT_SERVO_ID
define.description: Id of the tilt servo (default: TILT_SERVO)

define.name: PAN_SERVO_MIN
define.description: Pan servo max pwm duration in ms (default: 2000)

define.name: PAN_SERVO_MAX
define.description: Pan servo min pwm duration in ms (default: 1000)

define.name: TILT_SERVO_MIN
define.description: Tilt servo max pwm duration in ms (default: 2000)

define.name: TILT_SERVO_MAX
define.description: Pilt servo min pwm duration in ms (default: 1000)

define.name: PAN_SERVO_MAX_ANG
define.description: (0-360) Max angle that pan servo can reach in degrees (see documentation)

define.name: PAN_SERVO_MIN_ANG
define.description: (0-360) Min angle that pan servo can reach in degrees (see documentation)

define.name: TILT_SERVO_MAX_ANG
define.description: (0-360) Max angle that tilt servo can reach in degrees (see documentation)

define.name: TILT_SERVO_MIN_ANG
define.description: (0-360) Min angle that tilt servo can reach in degrees (see documentation)

define.name: DISABLE_AUTO_HEADING
define.description: Disable auto heading. Head your tracker to North if you use this option!

define.name: DISABLE_AUTO_ATTITUDE
define.description: Disable auto attitude. Place your tracker/device in flat place! Don't use this option if it really is necasarry.
